metadata.title: CVE-2024-24855 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's scsi device driver inlpfc_unregister_fcf_rescan() function. This can result in a null pointerdereference issue, possibly leading to a kernel panic or denial of serviceissue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-24855` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-223-generic - 4.15.0-223.235
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-223-generic - 4.15.0-223.235
